original_solution_mapping.L1: The theater can hold 50 people and they charge $8.00 to watch a movie so on a sold-out night they make 50*8 = $<<50*8=400.00>>400.00
original_solution_mapping.L2: On Tuesday night they only sold 24 tickets at $8.00 apiece so they made 24*8 = $<<24*8=192.00>>192.00
original_solution_mapping.L3: If they make $400.00 on a sold-out night and they only made $192.00 on Tuesday then they lost 400-192 = $<<400-192=208.00>>208.00

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 7190.
    Returns: the amount of money lost by not selling out.
    """
    # L1
    capacity = 50 # can hold 50 people
    ticket_price = 8.00 # charge $8.00 a ticket
    sold_out_revenue = capacity * ticket_price

    # L2
    tickets_sold_tuesday = 24 # only sold 24 tickets
    tuesday_revenue = tickets_sold_tuesday * ticket_price

    # L3
    money_lost = sold_out_revenue - tuesday_revenue

    # FA
    answer = money_lost
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: The theater can hold {capacity} people and they charge ${ticket_price} to watch a movie so on a sold-out night they make {capacity}*{ticket_price} = $<<{capacity}*{ticket_price}={sold_out_revenue}>>{sold_out_revenue}

On Tuesday night they only sold {tickets_sold_tuesday} tickets at ${ticket_price} apiece so they made {tickets_sold_tuesday}*{ticket_price} = $<<{tickets_sold_tuesday}*{ticket_price}={tuesday_revenue}>>{tuesday_revenue}

If they make ${sold_out_revenue} on a sold-out night and they only made ${tuesday_revenue} on Tuesday then they lost {sold_out_revenue}-{tuesday_revenue} = $<<{sold_out_revenue}-{tuesday_revenue}={money_lost}>>{money_lost}

flawed_nl_reconstruction.L1: The theater can hold 50 people and they charge $8 to watch a movie so on a sold-out night they make 50*8 = $<<50*8=400>>400
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L2: On Tuesday night they only sold 24 tickets at $8 apiece so they made 24*8 = $<<24*8=3>>3
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L3: If they make $400 on a sold-out night and they only made $3 on Tuesday then they lost 400-3 = $<<400-3=397>>397

explanation: Incorrect operation. The calculation should use '*' but used '/' instead.
